short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow the usage of the GeForce NOW web app on unsupported operating systems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow You to use the GeForce NOW web app on unsupported operating systems by spoofing the user agent string in the request headers, making GeForce NOW think we are using ChromeOS.
